meanings.definition: The quality or state of being wintry.
meanings.sent1: The wintriness of the landscape was breathtaking.
meanings.sent2: I could feel the wintriness in the air as I stepped outside.
meanings.sent3: Despite the wintriness, the children still enjoyed building a snowman.
meanings.sent4: The wintriness of her gaze made me shiver.
meanings.sent5: The wintriness of the forest was like stepping into a frozen fairytale.

meanings.definition: The cold, bleak, and dreary characteristics of winter.
meanings.sent1: The wintriness of the weather made me bundle up in layers.
meanings.sent2: The wintriness of the city streets was reflected in the gray sky above.
meanings.sent3: Despite the wintriness, the cozy fireplace kept us warm.
meanings.sent4: The wintriness of the situation left us feeling isolated.
meanings.sent5: The wintriness of his voice matched the frosty tone of his words.
